name: Image Surfer Pro Collection File
summary: Learn about .ISPC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ISPC files are saved in an encrypted binary format. Each file is specific to the version of Image Surfer Pro that created it.

description: File used by Image Surfer Pro, an Internet Explorer plug-in used for customizing the use of the browser; stores a collection of image URLs as well as descriptive information about the image collection; can be shared with other users.
